With the federal trial of James “Whitey” Bulger now over, Suffolk County prosecutors said they will meet with their federal counterparts to determine whether any state charges could be brought against Bulger.

The 16 year old, kidnapped by a close family friend, says the man got what he deserved when he died in a shootout with authorities in Idaho.
